title: Tether Co-Founder Sizes Up PayPal’s Stablecoin Ambitions
description: Tether pioneer William Quigley, who was also an early investor in PayPal, said he doubts the payments giant will bring much innovation to the stablecoin space.

title: Bitcoin hits $27,000, as the DXY index consolidates above 105
description:
Quick Take The trend between Bitcoin and the US Dollar Index (DXY) continues to reveal fascinating insights. As of press time, Bitcoin is again trading at $27,000, while DXY is trading above 105. Historically, high DXY values have coincided with lower Bitcoin prices, specifically during periods of financial turbulence. For instance, the last time DXY […]

title: ELI5:50 – What is a Zk-proof and why it matters for the future of finance
description:
From securing blockchain transactions to enhancing privacy, Zero-Knowledge Proofs (zk-proofs) is a transformative technology reshaping the future of finance. Let’s peel back the layers of this complex concept, from a five-year-old’s perspective to a fifty-year-old’s, and explore what it means for our emerging web3 economy. Spoiler: The words security and privacy come up a lot. […]

The post ELI5:50 – What is a Zk-proof and why it matters for the future of finance appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Thailand ups efforts to stimulate fragile economy amid recession worries
description: The Thailand government is set to implement measures to tighten tax regulations about overseas income. This move is part of the new government’s efforts to reduce income inequality and generate additional revenue for initiatives to stimulate the Southeast Asian economy. Prime Minister Srettha Thavisin announced that the finance ministry recently introduced more stringent rules concerning ... Read more

title: Generative AI will Dominate 50% of Video Game Development
description: Explore the transformative impact of generative AI on the video game industry. This comprehensive guide covers current applications, future potential, challenges, and ethical considerations. Learn how AI is set to revolutionize game development, from story creation to live operations, and what it means for developers and players alike.

title: AI and Human Intelligence: Denny Zhou’s Harvard Lecture
description: Denny Zhou, leading Google DeepMind’s reasoning team, delivered a captivating lecture hosted by the Harvard Machine Learning Foundations Group. The lecture, intriguingly titled “Teach Language Models to Reason,” delved into Zhou’s groundbreaking work aimed at closing the gap between machine intelligence and human cognition. Unveiling the mysteries of AI reasoning Zhou embarked on his quest ... Read more

title: Polkadot’s Liquid Staking: A Game-Changer for DOT Investors?
description: Zodia Custody and ParityTech will provide institutional access to the Polkadot ecosystem along with offering custodial services. Although the Polkadot ecosystem has witnessed a surge in staking, investors have raised concerns over the diminishing staking rewards. Liquid staking in the decentralized finance (DeFi) market has played a major role in improving the total value locked [...]

description:

title: Ripple CTO Says Company Can’t Go Around Debunking XRP Predictions
description:
Ripple Labs Chief Technology Officer David Schwartz, in a recent post on X, said the company can’t go around debunking every XRP price prediction. According to him, doing so may also lead to them calling accurate predictions false. The post came in response to a post by a user who accused the company’s executives of […]

The post Ripple CTO Says Company Can’t Go Around Debunking XRP Predictions appeared first on Coin Edition.
